text: John Roger Williams (born September 13, 1949) is an American businessman and politician. He has been the U.S. Representative for Texas's 25th congressional district since 2013. He is a member of the Republican Party. He worked for Governor Rick Perry as Secretary of State of Texas from November 2004 to July 1, 2007. With a net worth of $27.7 million, Williams is one of the wealthiest members of Congress. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Texas Category:Businesspeople from Texas Category:Businesspeople from Evanston, Illinois Category:Politicians from Evanston, Illinois Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Roger Williams (American politician)
